Package fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.melentjeffjuuso.util

Class Arrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.tamk.tiko.melentjeffjuuso.util.Arrays
  • public class Arrays
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Arrays contains methods to handle different tasks regarding arrays.
    Author:
    Juuso Melentjeff

    • Method Detail

      • toIntArray

        public static int[] toIntArray​(java.lang.String[] array)
        toIntArray method converts a string array into an int array. It also will give an error message if given string array does not contain numbers.
        Parameters:
        array - Argument gives the method a string array to be converted to int array.
        Returns:
        Converted array.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains​(int value,
                               int[] array)
        contains method for checking if certain value can be found from a certain array.
        Parameters:
        value - value to be searched.
        array - array to be searched from.
        Returns:
        true or false depending on if given value was found

      • containsSameValues

        public static int containsSameValues​(int[] array1,
                                     int[] array2)
        containsSameValues method checks how many same values given arrays with unique numbers contain.
        Parameters:
        array1 - array to be checked from.
        array2 - array to be checked from.
        Returns:
        how many numbers are the same in given arrays.

      • sort

        public static int[] sort​(int[] array)
        sort method sorts the array in descending order.
        Parameters:
        array - Array to be sorted.
        Returns:
        Returns a sorted array in descending order.

      • addPrefix

        public static java.lang.String[] addPrefix​(java.lang.String[] array,
                                           int leadingZeros)
        addPrefix Method adds leading zeros to array's numbers.
        Parameters:
        array - To which leading zeros are to be added.
        leadingZeros - Defines how many leading zeros are to be added. (1 means: 01 and 10, 2 means: 001 and 010)
        Returns:
        Returns a String array where leading zeros have been added.

      • toStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] toStringArray​(int[] array)
        toStringArray method converts int arrays to String arrays.
        Parameters:
        array - Array to be converted.
        Returns:
        Returns a converted array.
